Class EntityDistEmpirical<E extends Entity>

              • desmoj.core.dist.EntityDistEmpirical<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the element type

    public class EntityDistEmpirical<E extends Entity>
extends EntityDist<E>
    Empirically distributed stream of entities.
    See Also:
    Distribution

      • EntityDistEmpirical

        public EntityDistEmpirical(Model owner,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           boolean showInReport,
                           boolean showInTrace)
        Creates a stream of entities, where an individual probability can be assigned to each entity.
        Parameters:
        owner - Model : The distribution's owner
        name - java.lang.String : The distribution's name
        showInReport - boolean : Flag for producing reports
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for producing trace output

    • Method Detail

      • createReporter

        public Reporter createReporter()
        Creates the default reporter for the EntityDistEmpirical distribution.
        Overrides:
        createReporter in class Distribution
        Returns:
        Reporter : The reporter for the EntityDistEmpirical distribution
        See Also:
        EntityDistEmpiricalReporter

      • add

        public boolean add(E e,
                   double probability)
        Adds an entity (type E) to the range of this distribution, unless it is already present.
        Parameters:
        e - E : The entity to be added to the range of this distribution.
        probability - double : The relative probability of this distribution sampling Entity e.
        Returns:
        boolean : True, if the entity has been added to the range of this distribution (false, if it was already present).

      • changeProbability

        public void changeProbability(E e,
                              double newProbability)
        Adjusts the relative probability of an entity (type E from the range of this distribution being sampled.
        Parameters:
        e - E : The entity whose relative probability is adjusted.
        newProbability - double : The new relative probability of this distribution sampling Entity e.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(E e)
        Checks whether an entity is present (i.e. potentially sampled) by this distribution
        Parameters:
        e - E : The entity to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean : True, if the entity is included in the range of this distribution and false otherwise.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(E e)
        Removes an entity (type E) from the range of this distribution, if it is included.
        Parameters:
        e - E : The entity to be removed from the range of this distribution.
        Returns:
        boolean : True, if the entity has been removed from the range of this distribution (false, if it was not present).

      • sample

        public E sample()
        Returns the next empirically distributed entity sample.
        Specified by:
        sample in class EntityDist<E extends Entity>
        Returns:
        E : The next empirically distributed entity sample

      • setNonNegative

        public void setNonNegative(boolean newValue)
        Overrides the same method of desmoj.dist.Distribution. A warning that it makes no sense to set a EntityDistEmpirical to be (not) negative is printed since the distribution samples are not numerical.
        Overrides:
        setNonNegative in class Distribution
        Parameters:
        newValue - boolean : No effect. A warning is issued.
